select st.*, su.user_name from sys_tenant st left join sys_user su on st.tenant_id = su.tenant_id and su.user_type = '00' and su.del_flag = '0' where st.del_flag = '0' and st.tenant_id != 1
and st.tenant_name like concat('%', #{query.tenantName}, '%')
and su.user_name like concat('%', #{query.userName}, '%')
order by st.tenant_id desc
